examples.chinese: 台灣超商密度已經很高，但外送業者看準「宅商機」
examples.translation: Taiwan already has a high density of convenience stores, but delivery services are targeting the stay-at-home economy.

examples.chinese: 宅經濟讓外賣平台大賺。
examples.translation: The stay-at-home economy made food delivery platforms rich.
The pandemic boosted the stay-at-home economy.
